EmailTemplate.subject: It’s time to explain how your network technology can help governments
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> It’s time for action – take your LTE case to government Mobile operators are ideally situated to help governments provide mission-critical mobile broadband for their public safety users.
Governments will need the assurance that you have the right technologies in place to deliver the services they need.
Our latest Executive Summary brings together the technical benefits that working with mobile operators will bring. It shows how governments can:
- Benefit from LTE’s powerful Quality of Service controls - Get quick access to the right technical expertise - Gain more resilient, more secure services - Keep up with rapid technology changes - Retain control over spectrum © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
